note.p: Death: His residence in Gordon Square, London (11 or 16 September 1869)
Memberships: FRSE; Royal Academy of Sciences of Berlin (Corresponding ); Philosophical Society of Glasgow
Medals/Prizes: Royal Medal 1838 and 1850; Copley Medal 1862
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1869-1870 vol 18 pp xvii-xxvi signed by R A S
References: Sir John Craig, 'The Royal Society and the Royal Mint' in NR 1964 vol 19 pp 156-167
J S Rowlinson, 'The work of Thomas Andrews and James Thomson on the liquefaction of gases' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 143-159
Notes: DSB gives birth date as 21 December 1805. Boase and DSB give death date as 16 September 1869.
